        public double update(double milliseconds)
        For internal use only. Updates motor speed based on current speed, power, and inertia. Then, uses motor speed to update position.

      • isBusy

        public boolean isBusy()
        Indicates whether approaching target in RUN_TO_POSITION mode Result will become false when: ticks are nearly at the target AND speed is very slow
